https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iLRFkW3AwfCR7w5rPog4HhlNYLM.jpg The dream of Charles Dombais, the wealthy owner of the shipping company, is to have a son to continue his business. Tragically, his wife dies shortly after giving birth to their son. Dombey and Son
